column4: damn i was just thinking about if flooding & IRCwars still exist :D

How can I change Icons of running programs ? (On alt-tab menu and taskbar not the launchers) . I managed to do so for firefox but chromium's icon just doesn't change (I also changed /usr/icons/hicolor)  . Also is there a way to make default icon theme something other than hi-color.?
i tink if you change it in /usr/share/applications   in te relevant .desktop file, it will be used the way you want. Not sure though, worth a shot
